member.name: ID3D10DeviceChild.GetDevice
member.summary: Get a pointer to the device that created this interface.
member.param: Address of a pointer to a device (see ).

member.name: ID3D10DeviceChild.GetPrivateData
member.summary: Get application-defined data from a device child.
member.param: Pointer to the data stored with the device child. If pData is NULL, DataSize must also be 0, and any data previously associated with the guid will be destroyed.
member.returns: This method returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10DeviceChild.SetPrivateData
member.summary: Set application-defined data to a device child and associate that data with an application-defined guid.
member.param: Pointer to the data to be stored with this device child. If pData is NULL, DataSize must also be 0, and any data previously associated with the specified guid will be destroyed.
member.returns: This method returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10DeviceChild.SetPrivateDataInterface
member.summary: Associate an -derived interface with this device child and associate that interface with an application-defined guid.
member.param: Pointer to an -derived interface to be associated with the device child.
member.returns: This method returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10DeviceChild
member.summary: A device-child interface accesses data used by a device.
